fulltext:
DINH THI NGOC LAN 
REGIONAL PURCHASING SUPERVISOR 
HP:             01227075525 
E-mail:      ngoclan.dinh86@gmail.com 
Adress:     18/35 Vuon Chuoi St., Dist. 3, HCM.C 
Birthday:  15/05/1986 
GAMELOFT   
09/2017 – now 
REGIONAL PURCHASING SUPERVISOR 
Company brief:  Gameloft Vietnam (HCM, Da Nang, Ha Noi), Gameloft Indonesia (Jog 
Jakata, Jakarta), Philippines (Manila), India, Australia (Sydney, QLD, Vic) 
Company size : > 2000 
Manage general affairs function to support the key business needs 
 
Be responsible for high value deals and operation activites (Office Leasing, Server, 
ISP, Health insurance, staff trip, training course, office moving, etc.) 
Achive :  
Saving cost : 18% for VN ISP office, 20% for Indonesia ISP office 
Total cost saving for VN & Indonesia offices : 10-15% saving vs budget plan (2014-
2018) 
Moving project : Finance Analysis report for moving options, Legal issues, Fit-out 
and reimbursement previous office, Moving operation. (Moving & merge HCM 
office for 700 staffs) 
Responsible for the full spectrum of procurement activites for Gameloft offices: 
sourcing strategic supplier, ordering, planning & coordinating in any procurement 
activities. 
 
Manage Purchasing team across  Regional region as following : Purchasing 
strategy ; Policy & guidelines ; Purchasing tool (internal tool), ERP (in development 
period – for Gameloft global offices) 
 
Manage team members  located in each studio: KPI setting and evaluating ; 
Performance appraisal ; Training and coaching ; Methodology providing to 
challenging cases. 
Achive : Satisfaction level for quality of Purchasing team : 80% end-users are 
satisfied with Purchasing team (2018) 
 
Liaise among suppliers, relevant Regional department heads, Head Quarter & 
Regional Purchasing team 
 
Build and maintain good relationships with suppliers 
Legal concern :  
 
Safe-guard contract for company ; Risk reduction in affecting to the company. 
(related to Purchasing activities, coordinate with Accounting and HR department) 
 
Control contracts, and monitor the quality of service provided 
Accounting & Budget : 
 
Cooperate to build yearly budget with other departments 
 
Work with budget team and accounting team to make sure the budget is record 
correctly 
 
Control payment plan from vendors to make sure Gameloft cash flow is in good 
condition. 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Dinh Thi Ngoc Lan 
Page | 2 
 
Report directly to Regional CFO  
 
Other ad-hoc request from Regional CFO 
GAMELOFT   
11/2013 – 08/2017 
SEA PURCHASING SUPERVISOR 
Company brief:  Gameloft is the world’s leading mobile game located in Paris. 
Gameloft SEA has 8 studios: HCM, Da Nang, Ha Noi, Jog Jarkata, Jakarta, Manila. 
Company size: > 2000 
GAMELOFT  
09/2012 - 10/2013 
PURCHASER CUM REPORTING EXECUTIVE 
Company brief:  Gameloft is a the world’s leading mobile game located in Paris.  
Gameloft Vietnam has 4 studios: 2 studios in HCM, 1 in Da Nang, 1 in Ha Noi. 
Company size: > 1500 
 
Be responsible for the full spectrum of procurement process such as sourcing 
supplier, ordering, planning & coordination in any procurement activities for 2 
studios in HCM.C 
 
Manage suppliers and all purchases of entertainment activities and company’s 
events 
 
Improve procurement process & guideline for studios in SEA region 
 
Create and maintain frame contract, long-term contract with selective suppliers. 
 
Reduce costs of procurement and consult other staffs with purchasing authority 
 
Manage monthly cash flow for Gameloft Vietnam studios 
 
Report performance & purchasing activities directly to Finance Director. 
 
Handle reporting tasks included: 
+ Phone cost report, Allocation report, Purchasing report. 
+ Accuracy and effectiveness controlling by creating new templates, check list and 
guidelines 
+ Other periodical reports as request by SEA Finance Director and Head Quarter 
 
Assist Finance Director in other ad-hoc requests 
SHINSUNG 
ENG 
(VIETNAM) 
01/2011 – 08/2012 
BUSINESS SUPPORTER  
Company brief: Shinsung ENG (Vietnam) is a Korean Company major in supplying 
mechanical & electrical system to civil & industrial project. 
Company Size: 50 – 200 
 Handle the routine operations of logistics activities and purchasing activities: 
+ Provide information for making bid documents 
+ Make RFQ (request for quotation), contract, PO, payment requests 
+ Manage delivery and receiving process 
+ Deal with Customs issue 
+ Follow and make payment with suppliers and logistics agency 
+ Fill and keep maintenance all collections of database sheets 
+ Maintain relationship with current suppliers & develop new suppliers network 
 
Be responsible for all of office administration task. 
 
Organize company events, support HR/ Admin projects 
 
Make report and do other duties as required 
Dinh Thi Ngoc Lan 
Page | 3 
Vinatrans  International  Freight  Forwarders   2010 
DOCUMENT STAFF 
Company brief: Vinatrans provides sea and air freight forwarding services with HO 
in HCM and others branches : Ha Noi, Hai Phong & Can Tho. 
Company Size : > 500 
 
Contact related parties to get done of BL (House BL & Master BL) 
 
Follow payment procedure in accordance with Accounting regulations & 
partner requests, and ensure the cargo released on time 
 
Maintain relationship with overseas agents 
 
Analyse irregular cases to find issue as well as solution included: money claim to 
relevant parties, clarify to salesman 
 
Make report and do other duties when required 
University of Economics - HCM City 
Bachelor of Administration   
Ogilvy Foundation in cooperation with University of 
Economics - HCM City 
Certificate of trade mark development 
Foreign Trade University, HCM City Branch 
English Certificate of Banking and Finance 
Research and Development Institute of Logistics 
Purchasing Manager 
Demand Planning 
EDUCATION 
Technical 
 
Ability to align and motivate teams 
 
Good in communication  
 
Commercial awareness 
 
Passion for identifying how to constantly improve 
 
Capability to work under pressure 
 
Aptitude in decision-making and problem solving 
Personal 
 
Trustworthy 
 
Service mindset 
 
High responsibility 
 
Team-leading 
SKILLS 
Travel  Reading   Music 
HOBBIES
